imdb.plot outline: The State of Greenock is a satirical mockumentary set in Greenock in the year 2020. In 2019, Greenock was declared independent from the rest of the United Kingdom. A postman called Felix Crammond was, rather suspiciously, elected Greenock's first ever President. One year after his election, a camera crew was afforded an exclusive interview with the new President. Combining footage of his interview with "vox-pop" soundbites from some of Greenock's citizens, The State of Greenock examines the success of Crammond's presidency and his attempts to encourage migration to the region.
imdb.title: The State of Greenock
plot: BAFTA winning short satirical mockumentary following the President of the newly independent state of Greenock.::Clyde Water Productions

_The State of Greenock_ (qv) is a satirical mockumentary set in Greenock in the year 2020. In 2019, Greenock was declared independent from the rest of the United Kingdom. A postman called Felix Crammond was, rather suspiciously, elected Greenock's first ever President. One year after his election, a camera crew was afforded an exclusive interview with the new President. Combining footage of his interview with "vox-pop" soundbites from some of Greenock's citizens, _The State of Greenock_ (qv) examines the success of Crammond's presidency and his attempts to encourage migration to the region.::Clyde Water Productions
